short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quirky quotes with each new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each new tab will display a random quirky quote that might make you chuckle or offer some food for thought. Also, the font and the background colors were carefully chosen to be easy on the eyes.
